name: SABARAMATI SAMITI
briefDescription: Sabarmati Samiti is formed in the year 1987 to work towards empowerment of women in fishing & farming communities along the coast of Ganjam district through awareness, organization & mass mobilization the organization was legally registered in the year 1992.Numerous issues raised by the organization which includes the increasing trend of engaging child labour in various hazardous occupations, pollution of environment, health hazards, Disaster preparedness, education, Peace building and Rehabilitation programme etc.The main intention behind our effort is to achieve sustainable livelihood for tribal and other weaker section of the society.
